Docs.summary: Represents a token that can be used to rehydrate a long-running operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Id { get; }
.property instance string Id
Public ReadOnly Property Id As String
member this.Id : string

Docs.summary: Gets an ID representing the operation that can be used to poll for the status of the long-running operation. There are cases that operation id is not available, we return "NOT_SET" for unavailable operation id.
